text: aur jaan[1] lo ki tumhen jo kuchh ganeemat mein mila hai, usaka paanchavaan bhaag allaah tatha rasool aur (aapake) sameepavartiyon tatha anaathon, nirdhanon aur yaatriyon ke lie hai, yadi tum allaah par tatha us (sahaayata) par eemaan rakhate ho, jo hamane apane bhakt par nirnay[2] ke din utaaree, jis din, do senaayen bhid gaeen aur allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
